name: Beamerman
description:
Beamerman is a fast-paced isometric action game, in which players fire lazer beams and strategically reflect them to defeat their enemies while trying to avoid catching themselves in the crossfire.


In this latest version of Beamerman, we bring you local and online multiplayer!

Objectives

Players can battle each other or against the AI in an intense battle. Last man standing wins the game! 

There is also a score system that reflects your performance throughout the game.

Features

Intense Gameplay

Matches are quick and full of action! Use your lazers to destroy the crates blocking you and your opponent and get on the offensive! After a while, the game will enter into MAYHEM mode, so play the game to see what happens!

Reflection, Deflection

Mirrors are scattered all over the map that can reflect lazers. Use these mirrors to catch your opponents off-guard with a well-reflected lazer! You can also collect power-ups to increase the amount of reflections a lazer can perform.

Environmental Destruction

Watch your feet as there are Destruction Barrels that can pull the rug underneath you! Use these objects to manipulate the map to your advantage! Also, the map may also decide to fall apart after a while, so look out for that...

Multiplayer Madness

Play together with 1-3 friends locally or online! Battle for the Number 1 spot or challenge each other to a Score competition!

Note

To use a gamepad when connecting to Steam, please follow these steps:

  1. Open Steam overlay with Shift + Tab
  2. In the top right corner, click 'Controller Configuration'
  3. On the bottom of the Controller Configurator, click 'Browse Configs'
  4. Select Templates -> Gamepad
  5. On the bottom, click 'Apply Configuration'
